thread.title: Bridge built by drones can carry a man
thread.title_full: Bridge built by drones can carry a man

title: Bridge built by drones can carry a man
text:
The drones flew in complex patterns to build the foundations and strengthen their structure September 25 2015 
The drones flew in complex patterns to build the foundations and strengthen their structure September 25 2015 
Two drones began construction by hovering in a circular motion around a horizontal beam on one of the scaffolding towers September 25 2015 Battlefield robodog prepares for action Published at 12:01AM, September 24 2015 
Spot is controlled wirelessly with a video game controller by an operator up to 500m away and stays on all fours even after being kicked Selfies more deadly than sharks for show-offs Published at 12:01AM, September 24 2015 
An increasing variety of danger-poses is adopted by committed selfie takers — from showing off guns to dangling over precipices Campaigner wins privacy case against Facebook Published at 12:01AM, September 24 2015 
The case was brought by Max Schrems, an Austrian law student, who began a campaign against Facebook’s data protection policies in 2013 Google ‘charges advertisers for fake views’ Last updated at 12:01AM, September 24 2015 
Fake views of YouTube adverts by software ‘bots’ designed to artificially inflate advertising revenue were captured by Google’s fraud system Sponsored Editorial
